EmailTemplate.name: Secure Email Instructions
EmailTemplate.subject: Secure Email Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Payroll Administrator:
Your contract with USAble Life states that premiums for employees will increase as they enter into a new age bracket or have other Anniversary Premium Changes. We will send your premium change information via a secured email. To open the secured email, please refer to the following instructions.
Please open the attachment html that came with the email and follow the instructions to see your data.
Follow the instructions in the email message to open or view the attachment. Open the <message>.html attachment and then click the link VIEW YOUR ENCRYPTED MESSAGE. Sign in to the encryption portal with a Microsoft account or an Office 365 organizational account using your email address as the user name. If you have not signed up for a Microsoft account with your email address, you must sign up for a Microsoft account using your email address. After signing in, you can view the contents of the encrypted message.
Note: The Microsoft account used must have an email address that matches the address in the encrypted message. Otherwise, it will not be accepted.
Please feel free to call us at (800) 648-0271 if you have any questions or concerns.
